page.title: 13 EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Employment in Feltham is quite good.Feltham is situated near to one of the worlds largest airports -Heathrow. Many of the industries are connected with the airport and they provide a large number of jobs for the people of Feltham. There are a number of Industrial estates and most of the goods that are made here are called light industries. This means that they are light in weight but that they are high in cost. Examples of such firms are Konica who make electrical and photographic equipment,E.M.I. who make goods for the Ministry of Defence, and I.C.L. who specialise in Computers. There are also a host of other small electrical and engineering companies. As the airport is nearby there are a lot of warehouses and courier companies such as D.H.L. and T.N.T.
